00021 {
00034 template<typename ForwardIterator, typename T, typename CMP> bool
00035 continousFind( ForwardIterator &current, const ForwardIterator end, const T &compare, CMP compOp )
00036 {
00037     //find the first iterator which is does not compare less
00038     current = std::lower_bound( current, end, compare, compOp );
00039 
00040     if ( current == end //if we're at the end
00041          || compOp( compare, *current ) //or compare is less than that iterator
00042        )
00043         return false;//we didn't find a match
00044     else
00045         return true;//not(current <> compare) makes compare == current
00046 }
00047 }

00066 // The core tree traversal functions
00068 PropertyMap::mapped_type &PropertyMap::fetchEntry( const PropPath &path )
00069 {
00070     return fetchEntry( *this, path.begin(), path.end() );
00071 }
00076 PropertyMap::mapped_type &PropertyMap::fetchEntry(
00077     PropertyMap &root,
00078     const isis::util::PropertyMap::propPathIterator at, const isis::util::PropertyMap::propPathIterator pathEnd )
00079 {
00080     PropPath::const_iterator next = at;
00081     next++;
00082     Container &rootRef = root;
00083     iterator found = static_cast<Container &>( root ).find( *at );
00084 
00085     if ( next != pathEnd ) {//we are not at the end of the path (a proposed leaf in the PropMap)
00086         if ( found != root.end() ) {//and we found the entry
00087             mapped_type &ref = found->second;
00088             LOG_IF( ref.is_leaf(), Runtime, error )
00089                     << util::MSubject( found->first ) << " is a leaf, but was requested as a branch in "
00090                     << util::MSubject( util::listToString( at, pathEnd, "/" ) );
00091             return fetchEntry( ref.getBranch(), next, pathEnd ); //continue there
00092         } else { // if we should create a sub-map
00093             //insert a empty branch (aka PropMap) at "*at" (and fetch the reference of that)
00094             LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Creating an empty branch " << *at << " trough fetching";
00095             return fetchEntry( rootRef[*at].getBranch(), next, pathEnd ); // and continue there
00096         }
00097     } else { //if its the leaf
00098         LOG_IF( rootRef.find( *at ) == rootRef.end() , Debug, verbose_info ) << "Creating an empty entry " << *at << " trough fetching";
00099         return rootRef[*at]; // (create and) return that entry
00100     }
00101 }
00102 
00107 const PropertyMap::mapped_type *PropertyMap::findEntry(
00108     const PropertyMap &root,
00109     const propPathIterator at, const propPathIterator pathEnd )
00110 {
00111     propPathIterator next = at;
00112     next++;
00113     util::PropertyMap::const_iterator found = static_cast<const Container &>( root ).find( *at );
00114 
00115     if ( next != pathEnd ) {//we are not at the end of the path (aka the leaf)
00116         if ( found != root.end() ) {//and we found the entry
00117             const mapped_type &ref = found->second;
00118             return findEntry( ref.getBranch(), next, pathEnd ); //continue there
00119         }
00120     } else if ( found != root.end() ) {// if its the leaf and we found the entry
00121         return &found->second; // return that entry
00122     }
00123 
00124     return NULL;
00125 }
00126 bool PropertyMap::recursiveRemove( PropertyMap &root, const propPathIterator path_it, const propPathIterator pathEnd )
00127 {
00128     bool ret = false;
00129 
00130     if ( path_it != pathEnd ) {
00131         propPathIterator next = path_it;
00132         next++;
00133         iterator found = static_cast<Container &>( root ).find( *path_it );
00134 
00135         if ( found != root.end() ) {
00136             mapped_type &ref = found->second;
00137 
00138             if ( ! ref.is_leaf() ) {
00139                 ret = recursiveRemove( ref.getBranch(), next, pathEnd );
00140 
00141                 if ( ref.getBranch().isEmpty() )
00142                     root.erase( found ); // remove the now empty branch
00143             } else {
00144                 root.erase( found );
00145                 ret = true;
00146             }
00147         } else {
00148             LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Entry " << util::MSubject( *path_it ) << " not found, skipping it";
00149         }
00150     }
00151 
00152     return ret;
00153 }

00160 const std::vector< PropertyValue >& PropertyMap::propertyValueVec( const isis::util::PropertyMap::PropPath &path ) const
00161 {
00162     const mapped_type *ref = findEntry( *this, path.begin(), path.end() );
00163 
00164     if( ref && ref->is_leaf() ) {
00165         return ref->getLeaf();
00166     } else {
00167         LOG( Debug, warning ) << "Property " << path << " not found. Returning empty property.";
00168         static const _internal::treeNode emptyEntry;
00169         return emptyEntry.getLeaf();
00170     }
00171 }
00172 
00173 std::vector< PropertyValue >& PropertyMap::propertyValueVec( const isis::util::PropertyMap::PropPath &path )
00174 {
00175     mapped_type &n = fetchEntry( *this, path.begin(), path.end() );
00176     LOG_IF( ! n.is_leaf(), Debug, error ) << "Using branch " << path << " as PropertyValue";
00177     return n.getLeaf();
00178 }

00181 const PropertyValue &PropertyMap::propertyValue( const isis::util::PropertyMap::PropPath &path )const
00182 {
00183     return propertyValueVec( path )[0];
00184 }
00185 
00186 PropertyValue &PropertyMap::propertyValue( const isis::util::PropertyMap::PropPath &path )
00187 {
00188     std::vector< PropertyValue > &p = propertyValueVec( path );
00189     p.resize( 1 ); // the user is expecting only one entry, so remove the others
00190     return p[0];

00193 const PropertyMap &PropertyMap::branch( const isis::util::PropertyMap::PropPath &path ) const
00194 {
00195     const mapped_type *ref = findEntry( *this, path.begin(), path.end() );
00196 
00197     if( ! ref ) {
00198         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Trying to access non existing branch " << path << ".";
00199         static const _internal::treeNode emptyEntry;
00200         return emptyEntry.getBranch();
00201     } else {
00202         LOG_IF( ref->getBranch().isEmpty(), Runtime, warning ) << "Accessing empty branch " << path;
00203         return ref->getBranch();
00204     }
00205 }
00206 PropertyMap &PropertyMap::branch( const PropPath &path )
00207 {
00208     mapped_type &n = fetchEntry( *this, path.begin(), path.end() );
00209     return n.getBranch();
00210 }

00212 bool PropertyMap::remove( const PropPath &path )
00213 {
00214     return recursiveRemove( *this, path.begin(), path.end() );
00215 }
00216 
00217 bool PropertyMap::remove( const KeyList &removeList, bool keep_needed )
00218 {
00219     bool ret = true;
00220     BOOST_FOREACH( const KeyType & key, removeList ) {
00221         if( hasProperty( key ) ) { // remove everything which is there
00222             if( !( propertyValue( key ).isNeeded() && keep_needed ) ) { // if its not needed or keep_need is not true
00223                 ret &= remove( key );
00224             }
00225         }
00226     }
00227     return ret;
00228 }
00229 
00230 
00231 bool PropertyMap::remove( const isis::util::PropertyMap &removeMap, bool keep_needed )
00232 {
00233     iterator thisIt = begin();
00234     bool ret = true;
00235 
00236     //remove everything that is also in second
00237     for ( const_iterator otherIt = removeMap.begin(); otherIt != removeMap.end(); otherIt++ ) {
00238         //find the closest match for otherIt->first in this (use the value-comparison-functor of PropMap)
00239         if ( continousFind( thisIt, end(), *otherIt, value_comp() ) ) { //thisIt->first == otherIt->first - so its the same property or propmap
00240             if ( ! thisIt->second.is_leaf() ) { //this is a branch
00241                 if ( ! otherIt->second.is_leaf() ) { // recurse if its a branch in the removal map as well
00242                     PropertyMap &mySub = thisIt->second.getBranch();
00243                     const PropertyMap &otherSub = otherIt->second.getBranch();
00244                     ret &= mySub.remove( otherSub );
00245 
00246                     if( mySub.isEmpty() ) // delete my branch, if its empty
00247                         erase( thisIt++ );
00248                 } else {
00249                     LOG( Debug, warning ) << "Not deleting branch " << MSubject( thisIt->first ) << " because its no subtree in the removal map";
00250                     ret = false;
00251                 }
00252             } else if( !( thisIt->second.getLeaf()[0].isNeeded() && keep_needed ) ) { // this is a leaf
00253                 erase( thisIt++ ); // so delete this (they are equal - kind of)
00254             }
00255         }
00256     }
00257 
00258     return ret;
00259 }

00263 // utilities
00265 bool PropertyMap::isValid() const
00266 {
00267     //iterate through the whole map and return false as soon as we find something needed _and_ empty
00268     const const_iterator found = std::find_if( begin(), end(), treeInvalidP() );
00269     return found == end();
00270 }

00273 {
00274     return Container::empty();

00277 PropertyMap::DiffMap PropertyMap::getDifference( const PropertyMap &other ) const
00278 {
00279     PropertyMap::DiffMap ret;
00280     diffTree( other, ret, "" );
00281     return ret;
00282 }
00283 
00284 void PropertyMap::diffTree( const PropertyMap &other, PropertyMap::DiffMap &ret, istring prefix ) const
00285 {
00286     const_iterator otherIt = other.begin();
00287 
00288     //insert everything that is in this, but not in second or is on both but differs
00289     for ( const_iterator thisIt = begin(); thisIt != end(); thisIt++ ) {
00290         const PropPath::value_type pathname = prefix + thisIt->first;
00291 
00292         //find the closest match for thisIt->first in other (use the value-comparison-functor of PropMap)
00293         if ( _internal::continousFind( otherIt, other.end(), *thisIt, value_comp() ) ) { //otherIt->first == thisIt->first - so its the same property
00294             const mapped_type &first = thisIt->second, &second = otherIt->second;
00295 
00296             if ( ! ( first.is_leaf() || second.is_leaf() ) ) { // if both are a branch
00297                 const PropertyMap &thisMap = first.getBranch();
00298                 const PropertyMap &refMap = second.getBranch();
00299                 thisMap.diffTree( refMap, ret, pathname + "/" );
00300             } else if ( ! ( first == second )  ) { // if they are not equal
00301                 const PropertyValue firstVal = first.is_leaf() ? first.getLeaf()[0] : PropertyValue( Value<std::string>( first.toString() ) );
00302                 const PropertyValue secondVal = second.is_leaf() ? second.getLeaf()[0] : PropertyValue( Value<std::string>( second.toString() ) );
00303                 ret.insert( // add (propertyname|(value1|value2))
00304                     ret.end(),      // we know it has to be at the end
00305                     std::make_pair(
00306                         pathname,   //the key
00307                         std::make_pair( firstVal, secondVal ) //pair of both values
00308                     )
00309                 );
00310             }
00311         } else { // if ref is not in the other map
00312             const PropertyValue firstVal = thisIt->second.is_leaf() ? thisIt->second.getLeaf()[0] : PropertyValue( Value<std::string>( thisIt->second.toString() ) );
00313             ret.insert( // add (propertyname|(value1|[empty]))
00314                 ret.end(),      // we know it has to be at the end
00315                 std::make_pair(
00316                     pathname,
00317                     std::make_pair( firstVal, PropertyValue() )
00318                 )
00319             );
00320         }
00321     }
00322 
00323     //insert everything that is in second but not in this
00324     const_iterator thisIt = begin();
00325 
00326     for ( otherIt = other.begin(); otherIt != other.end(); otherIt++ ) {
00327         const PropPath::value_type pathname = prefix + otherIt->first;
00328 
00329         if ( ! _internal::continousFind( thisIt, end(), *otherIt, value_comp() ) ) { //there is nothing in this which has the same key as ref
00330             const PropertyValue secondVal = otherIt->second.is_leaf() ? otherIt->second.getLeaf()[0] : PropertyValue( Value<std::string>( otherIt->second.toString() ) );
00331             ret.insert(
00332                 std::make_pair( // add (propertyname|([empty]|value2))
00333                     pathname,
00334                     std::make_pair( PropertyValue(), secondVal )
00335                 )
00336             );
00337         }
00338     }
00339 }
00340 
00341 void PropertyMap::removeEqual ( const util::PropertyMap &other, bool removeNeeded )
00342 {
00343     iterator thisIt = begin();
00344 
00345     //remove everything that is also in second and equal (or also empty)
00346     for ( const_iterator otherIt = other.begin(); otherIt != other.end(); otherIt++ ) {
00347         //find the closest match for otherIt->first in this (use the value-comparison-functor of PropMap)
00348         if ( continousFind( thisIt, end(), *otherIt, value_comp() ) ) { //thisIt->first == otherIt->first  - so its the same property
00349             if ( ! removeNeeded && thisIt->second.getLeaf()[0].isNeeded() ) {//Skip needed
00350                 thisIt++;
00351                 continue;
00352             }
00353 
00354             if ( thisIt->second.empty() ) { //this is empty
00355                 if ( otherIt->second.empty() ) { //the other is empty
00356                     erase( thisIt++ ); // so delete this (they are equal - kind of)
00357                 } else {
00358                     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Keeping the empty " << thisIt->first << " because its is not empty in the other (" << *otherIt << ")";
00359                     thisIt++;
00360                 }
00361             } else if ( ! otherIt->second.empty() ) { // if the other is not empty as well
00362                 if ( thisIt->second == otherIt->second ) { //delete this, if they are equal
00363                     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Removing " << *thisIt << " because its equal with the other (" << *otherIt << ")";
00364                     erase( thisIt++ ); // so delete this (they are equal - kind of)
00365                 } else if ( ! ( thisIt->second.is_leaf() || otherIt->second.is_leaf() ) ) { //but maybe they are branches
00366                     PropertyMap &thisMap = thisIt->second.getBranch();
00367                     const PropertyMap &otherMap = otherIt->second.getBranch();
00368                     thisMap.removeEqual( otherMap );
00369                     thisIt++;
00370                 }
00371             } else {//only the other is empty
00372                 LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Keeping " << *thisIt << " because the other is empty";
00373                 thisIt++;
00374             }
00375         }
00376     }
00377 }

00380 PropertyMap::KeyList PropertyMap::join( const isis::util::PropertyMap &other, bool overwrite )
00381 {
00382     KeyList rejects;
00383     joinTree( other, overwrite, "", rejects );
00384     return rejects;
00385 }
00386 
00387 void PropertyMap::joinTree( const isis::util::PropertyMap &other, bool overwrite, util::istring prefix, PropertyMap::KeyList &rejects )
00388 {
00389     iterator thisIt = begin();
00390 
00391     for ( const_iterator otherIt = other.begin(); otherIt != other.end(); otherIt++ ) { //iterate through the elements of other
00392         if ( continousFind( thisIt, end(), *otherIt, value_comp() ) ) { // if the element is allready here
00393             if ( thisIt->second.empty() ) { // if ours is empty
00394                 LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Replacing empty property " << MSubject( thisIt->first ) << " by " << MSubject( otherIt->second );
00395                 thisIt->second = otherIt->second;
00396             } else if ( ! ( thisIt->second.is_leaf() || otherIt->second.is_leaf() ) ) { // if both are a subtree
00397                 PropertyMap &thisMap = thisIt->second.getBranch();
00398                 const PropertyMap &refMap = otherIt->second.getBranch();
00399                 thisMap.joinTree( refMap, overwrite, prefix + thisIt->first + "/", rejects ); //recursion
00400             } else if ( overwrite ) { // otherwise replace ours by the other (if we shall overwrite)
00401                 LOG( Debug, info ) << "Replacing property " << MSubject( *thisIt ) << " by " << MSubject( otherIt->second );
00402                 thisIt->second = otherIt->second;
00403             } else if ( ! ( thisIt->second == otherIt->second ) ) { // otherwise put the other into rejected if its not equal to our
00404                 LOG( Debug, info )
00405                         << "Rejecting property " << MSubject( *otherIt )
00406                         << " because " << MSubject( thisIt->second ) << " is allready there";
00407                 rejects.insert( rejects.end(), prefix + otherIt->first );
00408             }
00409         } else { // ok we dont have that - just insert it
00410             std::pair<const_iterator, bool> inserted = insert( *otherIt );
00411             LOG_IF( inserted.second, Debug, verbose_info ) << "Inserted property " << MSubject( *inserted.first ) << ".";
00412         }
00413     }
00414 }

00417 void PropertyMap::makeFlatMap( FlatMap &out, key_type key_prefix ) const
00418 {
00419     for ( const_iterator i = begin(); i != end(); i++ ) {
00420         key_type key = ( key_prefix.empty() ? "" : key_prefix + pathSeperator ) + i->first;
00421 
00422         if ( i->second.is_leaf()  ) {
00423             out.insert( std::make_pair( key, i->second.getLeaf()[0] ) );
00424         } else {
00425             i->second.getBranch().makeFlatMap( out, key );
00426         }
00427     }
00428 }
00429 
00430 PropertyMap::FlatMap PropertyMap::getFlatMap() const
00431 {
00432     isis::util::PropertyMap::FlatMap buff;
00433     makeFlatMap( buff );
00434     return buff;
00435 }

00437 
00438 bool PropertyMap::transform( const PropPath &from,  const PropPath &to, int dstID, bool delSource )
00439 {
00440     const PropertyValue &found = propertyValue( from );
00441     bool ret = false;
00442 
00443     if( ! found.isEmpty() ) {
00444         util::ValueReference &dst = static_cast<util::ValueReference &>( propertyValue( to ) );
00445 
00446         if ( found->getTypeID() == dstID ) {
00447             if( from != to ) {
00448                 dst = found ;
00449                 ret = true;
00450             } else {
00451                 LOG( Debug, info ) << "Not transforming " << MSubject( found ) << " into same type at same place.";
00452             }
00453         } else {
00454             LOG_IF( from == to, Debug, warning ) << "Transforming " << MSubject( found ) << " in place.";
00455             dst = found->copyByID( dstID );
00456             ret = !dst.isEmpty();
00457         }
00458     }
00459 
00460     if ( ret && delSource )remove( from );
00461 
00462     return ret;
00463 }

00495 void PropertyMap::addNeededFromString( const std::string &needed )
00496 {
00497     const std::list<std::string> needList = util::stringToList<std::string>( needed );
00498     //@todo util::stringToList<std::string>( needed,' ' ) would be faster but less robust
00499     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Adding " << needed << " as needed";
00500     BOOST_FOREACH( std::list<std::string>::const_reference ref, needList ) {
00501         addNeeded( key_type( ref.c_str() ) );

00505 bool PropertyMap::hasProperty( const PropPath &path ) const
00506 {
00507     const mapped_type *ref = findEntry( *this, path.begin(), path.end() );
00508     return ( ref && ref->is_leaf() && ! ref->getLeaf()[0].isEmpty() );
00509 }
00510 
00511 isis::util::PropertyMap::KeyType PropertyMap::find( isis::util::PropertyMap::KeyType key, bool allowProperty, bool allowBranch ) const
00512 {
00513     // make sure we only get the last part of the path if its one
00514     const PropPath path = util::stringToList<key_type>( key, pathSeperator );
00515 
00516     if( path.empty() ) {
00517         LOG( Debug, error ) << "Search key " << util::MSubject( key ) << " is invalid, won't search";
00518         return KeyType();
00519     } else if( path.size() > 1 ) {
00520         LOG( Debug, warning ) << "Stripping search key " << util::MSubject( key ) << " to " << path.back();
00521     }
00522 
00523     key = path.back();
00524 
00525     // if the searched key is on this brach return its name
00526     const Container &map = static_cast<const Container &>( *this );
00527     Container::const_iterator found = map.find( key );
00528 
00529     if( found != map.end() &&
00530         ( ( found->second.is_leaf() && allowProperty ) || ( !found->second.is_leaf() && allowBranch ) )
00531       ) {
00532         return found->first;
00533     } else { // otherwise search in the branches (getBranch() returns an empty PropMap for leaves - we wont have to check for that)
00534         BOOST_FOREACH( Container::const_reference ref, map ) {
00535             const KeyType foundKey = ref.second.getBranch().find( key, allowProperty, allowBranch );
00536 
00537             if( !foundKey.empty() ) // if the key is found abort search and return it with its branch-name
00538                 return ref.first + "/" + foundKey;
00539         }
00540     }
00541 
00542     return KeyType(); // nothing found
00543 }
00544 
00545 bool PropertyMap::hasBranch( const PropPath &path ) const
00546 {
00547     const mapped_type *ref = findEntry( *this, path.begin(), path.end() );
00548     return ( ref && ! ref->is_leaf()  );
00549 }
00550 
00551 bool PropertyMap::rename( const PropPath &oldname,  const PropPath &newname )
00552 {
00553     const mapped_type *old_e = findEntry( oldname );
00554     const mapped_type *new_e = findEntry( newname );
00555 
00556     if ( old_e ) {
00557         LOG_IF( new_e && ! new_e->empty(), Runtime, warning )
00558                 << "Overwriting " << std::make_pair( newname, *new_e ) << " with " << *old_e;
00559         fetchEntry( newname ) = *old_e;
00560         return remove( oldname );
00561     } else {
00562         LOG( Runtime, warning )
00563                 << "Cannot rename " << oldname << " it does not exist";
00564         return false;
00565     }
00566 }
00567 
00568 void PropertyMap::toCommonUnique( PropertyMap &common, std::set<key_type> &uniques, bool init )const
00569 {
00570     if ( init ) {
00571         common = *this;
00572         uniques.clear();
00573         return;
00574     } else {
00575         const DiffMap difference = common.getDifference( *this );
00576         BOOST_FOREACH( const DiffMap::value_type & ref, difference ) {
00577             uniques.insert( ref.first );
00578 
00579             if ( ! ref.second.first.isEmpty() )common.remove( ref.first );//if there is something in common, remove it
00580         }
00581     }
00582 }
00583 
00584 std::ostream &PropertyMap::print( std::ostream &out, bool label )const
00585 {
00586     FlatMap buff;
00587     makeFlatMap( buff );
00588     size_t key_len = 0;
00589 
00590     for ( FlatMap::const_iterator i = buff.begin(); i != buff.end(); i++ )
00591         if ( key_len < i->first.length() )
00592             key_len = i->first.length();
00593 
00594     for ( FlatMap::const_iterator i = buff.begin(); i != buff.end(); i++ )
00595         out << i->first << std::string( key_len - i->first.length(), ' ' ) + ":" << i->second.toString( label ) << std::endl;
00596 
00597     return out;
00598 }

00600 const PropertyMap::mapped_type *PropertyMap::findEntry( const PropPath &path )const

00606 bool PropertyMap::listP::operator()( const std::pair< const isis::util::istring, _internal::treeNode >& ref ) const
00607 {
00608     return ref.second.is_leaf() && ref.second.getLeaf().size() > 1;
00609 }
00610 
00611 bool PropertyMap::trueP::operator()( const PropertyMap::value_type &/*ref*/ ) const
00612 {
00613     return true;
00614 }
00615 bool PropertyMap::invalidP::operator()( const PropertyMap::value_type &ref ) const
00616 {
00617     return ref.second.getLeaf()[0].isNeeded() && ref.second.getLeaf()[0].isEmpty();
00618 }
00619 bool PropertyMap::treeInvalidP::operator()( const PropertyMap::value_type &ref ) const
00620 {
00621     if ( ref.second.is_leaf() ) {
00622         const PropertyValue &val = ref.second.getLeaf()[0];
00623         return val.isNeeded() && val.isEmpty();
00624     } else  {
00625         return ! ref.second.getBranch().isValid();
00626     }
00627 }
